byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Strategic raw materials: Brit Min Cross lauds moral embargo
snippet: LONDON, April 30--The government's apologies to American business men for the present restrictions on British purchases in the United States and the dislocation of trade, inseparable from the imposition of a war blockade on Germany, were tendered ...

headline.main: MINISTER DEFENDS PINCH OF BLOCKADE; Cross Says Americans Should Realize That Britain Is Fighting for Life MANY EVASIONS CHARGED Flow of Goods from the United States to Vladivostok Comes Under Scrutiny

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 30--The government's apologies to American business men for the present restrictions on British purchases in the United States and the dislocation of trade, inseparable from the imposition of a war blockade on Germany, were tendered today by Ronald H. Cross, Minister of Economic Warfare.
